alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 03 at 12:12PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 6 to 9 inches, especially in the Logan area mountains and the upper Cottonwood Canyons. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph on higher elevation ridges. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected, especially over Logan Summit, Sardine Summit and within the Cottonwood Canyons.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
